summary: "The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air" was a popular TV show on NBC from 1990 to 1996. It starred Will Smith as a teenager from Philadelphia who moves in with his rich relatives in Bel-Air, Los Angeles. The series followed his adventures and culture clashes with his upper-class family. It launched Will Smith's career and had 148 episodes over six seasons. A reunion special aired in 2020, and a dramatic remake, "Bel-Air," premiered in 2022. Only Will Smith and James Avery appeared in every episode.
title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
